name: Cheese Chase (Squishyblob, Daivy, Vincent Loo Ji Jian, Daisy Chan)
name_original: Cheese Chase (Squishyblob, Daivy, Vincent Loo Ji Jian, Daisy Chan)
description:
Silly little cheese on a pogo stick, how are you gonna escape from a nest of hungry mice?

Game Description

Cheese Chase is an asymmetrical multiplayer party platformer, where four players - three playing as hungry mice and one as a humanoid sentient block of cheese - run and hop around a 2D side-scrolling playground in a grand chase and tag game. 

In this game, the player who chooses to take on the role of the cheese will hop around on a pogo stick and will be given the objective to survive the onslaught of hungry mice controlled by the other remaining players. Players will then swap roles whenever the game ends.

Note: This is a local multiplayer game. So we recommend using Parsec to play online with friends. A Parsec tutorial is at the bottom of this page!
